languages.text: {n}Он наклоняется чуть ближе и произносит шепотом:{/n} "Умоляю... помогите мне! Только тихо, нельзя, чтоб кто-то услышал... Дело жизни и смерти!"
{n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"
languages.original_text: {n}Он наклоняется чуть ближе и произносит шепотом:{/n} "Умоляю... помогите мне! Только тихо, нельзя, чтоб кто-то услышал... Дело жизни и смерти!"

traits.locale_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"
{n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"
{n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"
{n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"
{n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

languages.text: {n}他又靠近了一点，低声开了口。{/n}“我求求您……帮帮我吧！不过请您小声点，绝对不能让别人听到我们的谈话……这是件生死攸关的大事！”
languages.original_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他又靠近了一点，低声开了口。{/n}“我求求您……帮帮我吧！不过请您小声点，绝对不能让别人听到我们的谈话……这是件生死攸关的大事！”

languages.text: {n}Se inclina ligeramente hacia ti y susurra:{/n} «¡Se lo ruego.. ayúdeme! Y baje la voz, no debe oírnos nadie... ¡es cuestión de vida o muerte!».
languages.original_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Se inclina ligeramente hacia ti y susurra:{/n} «¡Se lo ruego.. ayúdeme! Y baje la voz, no debe oírnos nadie... ¡es cuestión de vida o muerte!».

languages.text: {n}彼は少し身をかがめ、囁いてきた。{/n}「お願いします…助けてください！でも、大きな声は出さないでください。誰かに聞かれてはまずいんです…生死に関わる問題なんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は少し身をかがめ、囁いてきた。{/n}「お願いします…助けてください！でも、大きな声は出さないでください。誰かに聞かれてはまずいんです…生死に関わる問題なんです！」

languages.text: {n}Er beugt sich etwas näher und flüstert:{/n} "Ich flehe Euch an ... helft mir! Aber sprecht bitte leise, niemand darf uns hören ... Es geht dabei um Leben und Tod!"
languages.original_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er beugt sich etwas näher und flüstert:{/n} "Ich flehe Euch an ... helft mir! Aber sprecht bitte leise, niemand darf uns hören ... Es geht dabei um Leben und Tod!"

languages.text: {n}Il se penche vers vous pour vous murmurer :{/n} « Je vous en supplie... aidez-moi ! Mais ne parlez pas trop fort, il ne faut pas qu'on nous entende... C'est une question de vie ou de mort ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se penche vers vous pour vous murmurer :{/n} « Je vous en supplie... aidez-moi ! Mais ne parlez pas trop fort, il ne faut pas qu'on nous entende... C'est une question de vie ou de mort ! »

languages.text: {n}Derken kulağına eğilip fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Yalvarırım... Bana yardım edin! Ancak sessiz olmalısınız, kimse bizi duymasın. Ölüm kalım meselesi!"
languages.original_text: {n}He leans in a little closer and whispers,{/n} "I beg of you... help me! But please keep your voice down, we can't let anyone hear us... It's a matter of life and death!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana yaklaşıp fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Yalvarırım, bana yardım edin! Ancak sessiz olmalısınız, kimse bizi duymasın... Ölüm kalım meselesi!"
